00024 #ifndef _NIF_EXTRA_H_
00025 #define _NIF_EXTRA_H_
00026 
00027 #include "record.hpp"
00028 #include "nif_file.hpp"
00029 #include "record_ptr.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace Nif
00032 {
00033 
00038 class Extra : public Record
00039 {
00040 public:
00041   ExtraPtr extra;
00042 
00043   void read(NIFFile *nif) { extra.read(nif); }
00044 };
00045 
00046 class NiVertWeightsExtraData : public Extra
00047 {
00048 public:
00049   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00050   {
00051     Extra::read(nif);
00052 
00053     // We should have s*4+2 == i, for some reason. Might simply be the
00054     // size of the rest of the record, unhelpful as that may be.
00055     /*int i =*/ nif->getInt();
00056     int s = nif->getShort(); // number of vertices
00057 
00058     nif->getFloatLen(s);     // vertex weights I guess
00059   }
00060 };
00061 
00062 class NiTextKeyExtraData : public Extra
00063 {
00064 public:
00065   struct TextKey
00066   {
00067     float time;
00068     Misc::SString text;
00069   };
00070 
00071   std::vector<TextKey> list;
00072 
00073   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00074   {
00075     Extra::read(nif);
00076 
00077     nif->getInt(); // 0
00078 
00079     int keynum = nif->getInt();
00080     list.resize(keynum);
00081     for(int i=0; i<keynum; i++)
00082       {
00083         list[i].time = nif->getFloat();
00084         list[i].text = nif->getString();
00085       }
00086   }
00087 };
00088 
00089 class NiStringExtraData : public Extra
00090 {
00091 public:
00092   /* Two known meanings:
00093      "MRK" - marker, only visible in the editor, not rendered in-game
00094      "NCO" - no collision
00095    */
00096   Misc::SString string;
00097 
00098   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00099   {
00100     Extra::read(nif);
00101 
00102     nif->getInt(); // size of string + 4. Really useful...
00103     string = nif->getString();
00104   }
00105 };
00106 
00107 } // Namespace
00108 #endif
